snippet: Losses by tech companies pushed the Dow and Nasdaq down for the day, but the S.& P. 500 finished ahead for the fourth straight week.
abstract: Losses by tech companies pushes the Dow Jones and Nasdaq stock gauges down for the day, but the S&P 500 finishes ahead for the fourth straight week.
lead_paragraph: Losses by tech companies pushed the Dow and Nasdaq down for the day, but the S.& P. 500 finished ahead for the fourth straight week.

headline.main: Mixed Day on Wall Street as Tech Giants Disappoint
headline.print_headline: Mixed Day on Wall Street as Investors Digest Disagreeable Technology Earnings
